#Font discussion

= Introduction =

I'm unhappy with the current font. It looks *bolded* and bloated.


= Details =

Options

       * Don't have to work on the font
    * Cons
       * I've looked and haven't found a suitable font
  * go back and unbold each symbol

    * Cons
